duties_responsibilities.duty: Merchandise gift card products and various product lines in multiple retailers across the assigned market territory.
Pack out product, set to plan-o-gram, report out-of-stock, place shelf tags, conduct resets, and install new fixtures.
Build relationships with Retail Management and provide customer shopping guidance for merchandised product lines.
Complete all assigned projects within designated territory, participate in weekly conference calls, and complete all call report questions along with taking pictures using a smartphone or tablet.
Cover stores outside of designated territory on an as-needed basis and/or vacation coverage.
Ability to use web portal reporting systems from a wireless tablet/phone.
